title: Remove stock images by replacing Memories photos with new non-stock assets

requirements.text: Replace the three current Memories (Step 3) static images with new non-stock images by generating three new 300x200 JPG assets and updating the Memories step to reference the new asset paths, while keeping the existing layout, captions, and behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: MemoriesStep renders 3 cards with the same captions and layout as before.

The images used in MemoriesStep are NOT the current files `/assets/generated/memory-1.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-3.dim_300x200.jpg` and instead use newly generated non-stock assets.
All three images load correctly in the browser and remain static across refreshes (no upload UI and no localStorage-based overrides).

requirements.text: Audit the frontend for any remaining placeholder/stock-image references (including the historical `https://via.placeholder.com/300x200` memory URLs) and ensure no UI-visible images are still using placeholder/stock sources.
acceptanceCriteria: No references to `via.placeholder.com/300x200` remain in the frontend codebase.
All UI-visible images used by the Valentine flow are loaded from bundled static assets (no external placeholder/stock URLs).

requirements.text: Update `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md` so the post-deployment verification section references the new Memories image asset paths instead of the old ones.
acceptanceCriteria: The checklist lists the three updated Memories image paths that are actually used by the app.
Checklist text remains in English and the rest of the checklist remains unchanged except where required for the updated image paths.

constraints: Do not change the 5-step navigation, step order, captions, or interactive behaviors (floating hearts, confetti, evasive NO).
Do not reintroduce any Memories image upload UI or localStorage-based image replacement behavior.
Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing any user-facing copy beyond updating the deployment checklist image path entries.
Adding new backend functionality or persistence for images.

edits: Generate new non-stock romantic memory-style image, warm tones, subtle bokeh, no text (memory-1.dim_300x200.jpg > memory-1-v2.dim_300x200.jpg)
Generate new non-stock romantic memory-style image, warm tones, different scene from the first, no text (memory-2.dim_300x200.jpg > memory-2-v2.dim_300x200.jpg)
Generate new non-stock romantic memory-style image, warm tones, different scene from the first two, no text (memory-3.dim_300x200.jpg > memory-3-v2.dim_300x200.jpg)
